parameter.name: useGzipCompression
parameter.label: Use compressed web app resources
parameter.description: Serves the compressed web app static files with Content-Encoding: gzip. This decreases significantly the download size of the app. This is NOT supported by openHAB Cloud/myopenhab.org!

parameter.name: theme
parameter.label: Tokenizer
parameter.description: The alphanumeric tokenizer removes punctuation and might help with languages where entities might not always be enclosed between whitespaces (French, Spanish, Italian... Example: "l'humidit√©", "l'alarme")
